Class DefaultAcceptHeaderToFormat

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptHeaderToFormat
@ApplicationScoped
public class DefaultAcceptHeaderToFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements AcceptHeaderToFormat

The default AcceptHeaderToFormat implementation searches for registered mime types. It also handles conneg with extended media types (i.e. vnd+xml)
